data.text:
🏥 Healthcare workers
🔬 Scientists 
🧪 Innovators

Throughout the pandemic, women have been leading the fight against #COVID19.

Meet some of the inspirational #WomenInScience who are leading us to a safer future. https://t.co/9nzqnHvtvr https://t.co/D7q9alP3kY

"It is my privilege to be a part of the system that believes in and empowers women."

-- Superintendent Sangya Malla of Nepal on receiving the UN Woman Police Officer of the Year Award. https://t.co/RWerLzUuUm https://t.co/4wtydB8zbI

"There is no limit to what YOU can do to take #ClimateAction." 

-- Climate activist @SorengArchana of @YAGClimate talks to @Maisie_Williams at #COP26 about the many creative ways each of us can #ActNow to protect people and planet. https://t.co/Xr4oTiu9hh https://t.co/Vs8TrmNaKi

Pneumonia is an acute respiratory infection that can be prevented by:
💉 Immunization 
🍎 Adequate nutrition
💨 Addressing environmental factors

More from @WHO on Friday's #WorldPneumoniaDay: https://t.co/B1d0OPnAW0 https://t.co/dg9bLGQW05

As the UN climate conference #COP26 is scheduled to close on Friday, watch as @UNHabitat chief @MaimunahSharif & @globalNYC's @PAbeywardena talk about sustainable cities & the role they play in taking #ClimateAction to protect people & planet. https://t.co/diHpgfOeCZ #GlobalGoals https://t.co/2xAzbgMObb

The number of forcibly displaced people worldwide now exceeds 84 million.

Violence, insecurity & the climate crisis are driving more people from their homes than ever before, says @Refugees. https://t.co/XAdSANGa3y

Pneumonia kills more than 800,000 children every year, accounting for 15% of all deaths of children under 5.

On Friday's #WorldPneumoniaDay, see how @WHO is working to protect, prevent & treat pneumonia in children. https://t.co/BF7zlHClJ6 https://t.co/hvSSCkxXLG

"Hope is in the movement of the young people who are already creating change."

In a #ClimateAction chat with @antonioguterres at #COP26, @UNICEF Youth Advocate @nickibeckerok says young people like her are not passive victims of the climate crisis. https://t.co/y6xJ8Yun4k https://t.co/hFlumWOmu3

"We need pledges to be implemented. We need commitments to turn concrete. We need actions to be verified."

-- @antonioguterres says announcements at #COP26 are encouraging but far from enough. https://t.co/GEXgDYBGmu https://t.co/mQzwxjmyRB

"I will not give up."

-- @antonioguterres talks about the importance of righting the wrong of climate injustice with @UNICEF Youth Advocate & #ClimateAction activist @nickibeckerok at #COP26. https://t.co/y6xJ8YcMcM https://t.co/fR4lybKQaZ

#TBT to 2015 when @LeoDiCaprio showed his support for #ClimateAction at #COP21 in Paris.

Happy birthday to our Messenger of Peace 🎉! 

You TOO can #ActNow to protect people & planet: https://t.co/dDZ0DeYPhW https://t.co/KOTMj04gim

The climate crisis is destroying livelihoods, disrupting food security, driving displacement and fueling conflict.

For refugees, displaced and stateless people, 
it is a crisis on top of a crisis. 

Here's how you can help https://t.co/KRW8m9DXRb via @refugees https://t.co/kWKhrpufjx

Since 2012, @SunFunder investments have enabled 8 million people to gain improved access to solar energy. ☀️ 

Their efforts have earned them a @UNFCCC Global #ClimateAction award. 🏆 

Lean more about the all the 2021 winners: https://t.co/YGMVD87mzR #COP26 https://t.co/ajzFppIRi2

"This is the most important battle of my life, and I will not give up."

-- @antonioguterres discusses the urgent need for #ClimateAction with @UNICEF Youth Advocate and climate activist @nickibeckerok at #COP26. https://t.co/3rvQ8jkkKH https://t.co/VyHSam5cQ4

#COVID19 is threatening progress toward eliminating measles.

With 2020 marking the largest increase in infants missing their first dose of the measles vaccine in 20 years, the risk of outbreaks is mounting.

More from @WHO: https://t.co/NJec2u5Osp #VaccinesWork https://t.co/2JMUj14ZOW

Globally, there are nearly 240 million children living with disabilities. 

From accessing their basic needs to exercising their fundamental rights, latest report from @UNICEF explores the hardships children with disabilities face around the world. https://t.co/J03LFZS3Rk

Starting soon: @antonioguterres takes part in a #ClimateAction conversation with @UNICEF Youth Advocate @nickibeckerok LIVE on @Instagram from #COP26. 

Watch: https://t.co/h1O6fCINp5 https://t.co/p37roipTAJ

"If you could stop the next tornado from hitting your home, the next hurricane from wiping out your city, the next drought from starving your people, wouldn’t you?"

-- @Refugees Goodwill Ambassador @EmiThePoet at #COP26. 

See how you can #ActNow: https://t.co/TrmoKhFYEo https://t.co/ZFnJENqbdK

Investing in science is a necessity, not a luxury. 

On Wednesday's World #ScienceDay for Peace & Development, find out from @UNESCO how your country is supporting science 👉https://t.co/UQuWEFRKJb https://t.co/a19PJIbDsh

"Without full inclusion and equality, peace is a job half done."

-- @antonioguterres urges countries to address the root causes of conflict, such as inequality & poverty, investing in universal health coverage, social protection and more. 

https://t.co/9PVkwgdDZv

The world needs science, and science needs women. 👩‍🔬🧪

On Wednesday's World #ScienceDay for Peace & Development, @UNESCO explains the importance of equal access to education in science, technology, engineering & mathematics (STEM): https://t.co/nRkpTKsXWP https://t.co/gShyi7uLD7

People around the world are taking #ClimateAction and pledging to do their part in Keeping the Promise of the #GlobalGoals. 

From reducing food waste to making the best use of our planet's resources, join them in creating a better future for all! https://t.co/hKdCXOPbA2 https://t.co/9FBC2wrgT5

Science is 🗝️ to understanding our 🌍, from #COVID19 to the causes of the climate emergency.

On Wednesday's World #ScienceDay for Peace & Development, join @UNESCO in promoting sound science across borders and disciplines. https://t.co/pMwOVswgqS https://t.co/jqvU4l17qV

.@UNMigration & @Refugees call for a de-escalation of situation along Belarus-Poland border and stress the need for countries to ensure the safety and human rights of migrants and refugees. #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/1Olgx0dOs4

"We have no more time to waste. The most important thing now is real #ClimateAction."

- Activists Julieta Marino Tartaglino of @IYCM & @SorengArchana of @YAGClimate talk with @Maisie_Williams about the need to #ActNow to protect our planet.

Watch: https://t.co/Xr4oTiLKFR #COP26 https://t.co/qAgiQiN1l6

It's the International Week of Science & Peace! 🕊️🔬

Discover the links between science & tech and peace & security: https://t.co/3Epj6vTPiI https://t.co/54cjTxZRvr

Myanmar: Growing conflict, #COVID19 and a failing economy have left 3 million people in need of life-saving assistance, says @UNReliefChief.

Humanitarians have provided aid to 1.67+ million people despite attacks, access limitations & funding shortfalls.
https://t.co/M8KHuaquK9

The #COVID19 pandemic has delayed efforts to address the climate crisis, says @WHO. 

Countries need more support to plan & prepare for climate-related health 
risks in the future. https://t.co/7DDEpFyNJO

"The risk of Ethiopia descending into widening civil war is only too real -- that would bring about a humanitarian catastrophe and consume the future of such an important country.”

-- @UNDPPA chief @DicarloRosemary briefs Security Council. https://t.co/o33OCwIyo3
As the UN climate conference #COP26 goes into its second week in Glasgow, follow the #ClimateAction and listen to our daily podcast "The Lid Is On". 🎧 https://t.co/SdwtJRb8jZ https://t.co/tpdJKiAZ0V

The number of people on the edge of famine has risen to 45 million - up by 3 million this year - as acute hunger spikes around the world.

@WFP says nearly $7 billion required to meet urgent food & nutrition needs of those on the brink of starvation. https://t.co/cuPaLvrMP4

📸: Solar panels at @UNEP and UN Headquarters are some of the ways we are working to reduce our own environmental footprint. 

More details about how the UN is taking #ClimateAction:  https://t.co/1xFzIhETDK https://t.co/iuVnI1Geny

"Land is our own mother.
Once we lose it, we lose our identity."

Indigenous women like Alice play key roles in their communities & beyond, speaking up for land conservation, women’s empowerment, human rights & more. #WeAreIndigenous via @UN_Women https://t.co/aghWDm0cnc

Young climate activists met Rex, the Dinosaur, at #COP26 & they all agree:

We can no longer ignore the climate crisis. 

It's time to stop making excuses! 

Let's take #ClimateAction before it’s too late. https://t.co/VRymFWLHGn #DontChooseExtinction https://t.co/15ei9GqAUX

Diversity is a strength, not a threat. Yet racism is a problem in every country.

See how you can take action to #FightRacism and stand up for our common humanity: https://t.co/PWxqEMS8La https://t.co/xfiRH9xNxC

Climate activists and influencers joined world leaders at the UN climate conference #COP26 in Glasgow to demand urgent #ClimateAction. 

Get ideas for how you can #ActNow to help protect our planet: https://t.co/TrmoKhXA2Y https://t.co/D3T6kd1kU1

"Do the right thing for our planet."

-- @worldscouting Chief Ambassador @BearGrylls was at #COP26 in Glasgow this week, representing scouts from around the world who are demanding #ClimateAction. https://t.co/kgvyAMiv3e https://t.co/1sxzXe0fMU

Ethiopia: Millions of people are displaced and in urgent need of life-saving aid.

The UN is on the ground, providing assistance as the humanitarian situation unfolds in the country. 

Learn about our response & how you can help. https://t.co/gIy5F1MpJp

Ethiopia: Millions of people are displaced and in urgent need of life-saving aid.

The UN is on the ground, providing assistance as the humanitarian situation unfolds in the country.

Learn about our response & how you can help. https://t.co/gIy5F1MpJp

"We have the possibility right now to remove the death & devastation from #COVID19 - right now."

-- @WHO's @mvankerkhove talks about the importance of taking the necessary steps to end the pandemic on Awake At Night. https://t.co/EYOdeQ3syP https://t.co/5xbFBfm1yK

People caught in humanitarian crises are among those most vulnerable to the climate emergency. 

@UNOCHA is urging world leaders at #COP26 to fulfil their promise of $100 billion annually for #ClimateAction in developing countries. https://t.co/Kxd2a1FQN9

"It's almost as if glaciers are moving faster than world leaders. And so my message to them is: What we need is action, action, action."

-- @UNEP Patron of the Oceans @LewisPugh calls on countries to #ActNow at #COP26. https://t.co/EQwt43i8Kr https://t.co/GAjUbe072h

The sirens are sounding.

Our planet is telling us something - and so are people everywhere.

We must listen — we must act — and we must choose wisely.

Choose ambition.

Choose solidarity.

Choose to safeguard our future and save humanity.

-- @antonioguterres at #COP26. https://t.co/G8kWTCXMbs

At #COP26, @IFAD Goodwill Ambassadors @IdrisElba & @SabrinaDhowre discussed the urgent need to #ActNow to protect people & planet with UN #ClimateAction Adviser @SelwinHart. 

Find out what you can do to join them in their efforts: https://t.co/TrmoKhXA2Y https://t.co/YoX2rWFXXH

World leaders, climate activists, business leaders and others have gathered at #COP26 in Glasgow to demand urgent #ClimateAction. 

Check out more images from @UNFCCC. https://t.co/wBweR9l0vA https://t.co/zJga15Sdpo

"When we protect nature, nature provides security for us; it gives us the water we drink, the food we eat & the air we breath."

On Nature Day at #COP26, @UNEP chief @andersen_inger explains why nature-based solutions are absolutely critical to address the climate crisis. https://t.co/fjfiUTQ7d6

This week, @UNEP Goodwill Ambassador @elliegoulding & Patron of the Oceans @LewisPugh were at the UN climate conference #COP26 in Glasgow to call for urgent #ClimateAction. 

Here is how you can #ActNow to help protect our planet: https://t.co/TrmoKhXA2Y https://t.co/bNQlPApH4s

"We need concrete #ClimateAction -- not empty promises. The future of their generation depends on it."

-- @antonioguterres met with young activists at #COP26 this past week.

Get ideas on how you too can #ActNow to protect our planet: https://t.co/X0Shwfcd3n https://t.co/MkpfSNgtdh

Veteran judge Hillary Charlesworth of Australia elected to the @CIJ_ICJ, the UN's principal judicial organ.

Preeminent scholar of international law becomes the fifth woman to serve on the Court. https://t.co/XogMhrihDk

"Is this how our story is due to end?" asked Sir David Attenborough at #COP26. 

"Perhaps the fact that people most affected by climate change are no longer some imagined future generation but young people alive today, will give us the impetus to turn this tragedy into triumph." https://t.co/gLdklVf6p2

Peace is not possible without the preservation of natural resources that sustain livelihoods. 

More on Saturday's #EnvConflictDay: https://t.co/3FVx9OEaIA #GlobalGoals https://t.co/942hZYlVNQ

This week, @UNEP Goodwill Ambassador @rockydawuni was at the UN climate conference #COP26 in Glasgow to call for urgent #ClimateAction.

Here is how you can #ActNow to help protect our planet: https://t.co/TrmoKhXA2Y https://t.co/Nh6MwKrys8

In Friday's #COP26 Dialogue, @AminaJMohammed is joined by SDG Advocate & @UNEP Goodwill Ambassador @deespeak, SDG Advocate @hindououmar & @YAGClimate's @Nathan_Metenier to talk about climate justice and the urgent need to #ActNow. https://t.co/Rn2Y7gjjVU https://t.co/wWLQPzBTE8

Healthy ecosystems 🌳 and sustainably managed resources 💦 can help reduce the risk of armed conflict 🕊️ and achieve the #GlobalGoals. 

Saturday is #EnvConflictDay. https://t.co/3FVx9OEaIA https://t.co/xy2msKqlze

Congratulations to Superintendent Sangya Malla of Nepal for receiving the UN Woman Police Officer of the Year Award!

The @UNPOL Officer is currently #ServingForPeace with @MONUSCO, supporting the #COVID19 response & leading environmental initiatives. https://t.co/RWerLzCTvM https://t.co/O7NK6RaA3s

"Sudan has been a beacon of progress for the region and it is urgent to restore civilian rule."

-- @UNHumanRights chief @MBachelet at special session of UN Human Rights Council on situation in the country. https://t.co/opUqTAEMPP

"There is no social justice without climate justice!"

On Youth Day at #COP26, climate activist @nickibeckerok from Argentina says only ambitious & urgent #ClimateAction can save our communities & our future. https://t.co/EQwt43zK91 https://t.co/Riqvw7CFWY

"Do the right thing for our planet."

-- @worldscouting Chief Ambassador @BearGrylls is at #COP26 in Glasgow representing scouts around the world who are demanding #ClimateAction. 
https://t.co/EQwt43zK91 https://t.co/cp2FNHiTOh

Preparing for a tsunami, along with early warning systems & education, can save lives. 

On Friday's #TsunamiDay, @UNDRR explains what causes this destructive phenomenon. https://t.co/65KOAxYuOr https://t.co/NkJ0Ug0coC

"What we're looking for is a just & inclusive & equitable energy transition."

-- @DamilolaSDG7 from @SEforALLorg explains the importance of Thursday's Energy Day at #COP26. https://t.co/EQwt43zK91 #ClimateAction https://t.co/WCpo6y4mLT

We cannot postpone #ClimateAction!

Addressing the climate emergency requires a bold global response that will safeguard lives and livelihoods, & help achieve the #GlobalGoals.

#ActNow to protect our planet: https://t.co/UfRMNsZ40Q https://t.co/U4XOxjH5FF

"Science and international cooperation — as well as preparedness and early action — must be at the heart of our efforts to save lives from tsunamis and other hazards."

-- @antonioguterres on Friday's #TsunamiDay. https://t.co/qfRKPKIH7L https://t.co/M9YVLPkM0Z

Families in Southern Madagascar are facing famine-like conditions due to the impacts of the climate crisis. 

As food sources almost completely vanish, @WFP is scaling up its response to the desperate situation. https://t.co/Jta8pxlYx5 https://t.co/f9f0OkuTcd

Tsunamis are rare events, but they are among the deadliest and costliest disasters.

More from @UNDRR on Friday's #TsunamiDay: https://t.co/iPgMgJGlfw https://t.co/dkLN24nOb9

“The coming winter could lead to more vulnerability & suffering. We are in a race against time." 

In Afghanistan, @UNMigration chief warns that conflict, poverty & climate crisis have pushed the country to brink of collapse. https://t.co/EK3U3ZBFrS https://t.co/Gh3gWByxzR

Without a nationality, stateless people face being excluded from education, medical care & legal employment - basic human rights. 

See how @Refugees works to #EndStatelessness: https://t.co/tFjZASgvA7 #IBelong https://t.co/7uViuvZy9L

No child should be worried about being teased, excluded or be the subject of lies & rumours – especially at school.

On Thursday's #StopBullying Day, see how @UNESCO helps create a safe & inclusive learning environment for all. https://t.co/W8yoWcKjr3

 https://t.co/G3bKOWeYiv

The increase in impacts of the climate emergency is far outpacing efforts to adapt to them.

New @UNEP #AdaptationGap report warns that climate crisis adaptation efforts need to be urgently stepped up or humanity will face major disruptions. https://t.co/O2r8nVHYPj https://t.co/dw7jfAj7TN

From low self-esteem to depression, the consequences of cyberbullying can be devastating for young people. 

On Thursday's #StopBullying Day, @UNICEF helps shed light on the dangers of cyberbullying & how to prevent it. https://t.co/jRf0zrM1BP
Starting soon: @antonioguterres talks to students at @Cambridge_Uni about ethics and the climate crisis. Watch live: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf #ClimateAction https://t.co/f7ljDPGrqo

#दीपावली की शुभकामनाएं!

A happy and safe #Diwali to all those who are celebrating! https://t.co/mPYHcYrWCy

This is a watershed moment for #ClimateAction.

-- At #COP26, UN Envoy Mark Carney announced that private sector companies have pledged to invest USD $130 trillion in alignment with the goals of the #ParisAgreement. https://t.co/tToLA6tCMJ

Bullying can have serious impacts on children’s mental health and well-being, while also depriving them of their fundamental right to education. 

Thursday is #StopBullying Day. https://t.co/7wonWWfOfx via @UNESCO https://t.co/ZUnv8F3bUW

🪔 शुभ #दिवाली!

During #Diwali, the festival of lights - celebrated in India & by followers of many faiths across the world - clay lamps are lit to signify the victory of good over evil. https://t.co/1QBc5ngLHh

At #COP26, @antonioguterres thanked UN Messenger of Peace @LeoDiCaprio for his commitment to #ClimateAction. 

Learn how you can join him in protecting our planet: https://t.co/UfRMNsZ40Q #ActNow https://t.co/NOYOh4hywY

At #COP26, @F1 World Champion & sustainability entrepreneur @NicoRosberg hopes to get more of the world's most influential sports teams to pollute less and join the UN Sports for #ClimateAction framework. 

More from @UNFCCC: https://t.co/N3PWhq4kjE https://t.co/CaoIIJF3m5

"We just want to protect what belongs to us. Most importantly, we want to recover our future."

At #COP26, young climate activists talked with @Maisie_Williams about their motivation for taking #ClimateAction. 

Here's how you can join them & #ActNow: https://t.co/TrmoKhXA2Y https://t.co/37C0kqptGW

Afghanistan: Humanitarian needs are rising rapidly ahead of winter, when temperatures can dip to -25⁰C. 

To help those in need, the first of three @Refugees flights, carrying 33 tons of winterization kits has landed in Kabul. https://t.co/RzD0yj4Nbl

People in low-income countries are much more likely to be displaced by extreme weather than people in rich countries.

As leaders meet for the #COP26 climate conference, @UNOCHA explores why the climate crisis is a humanitarian emergency. https://t.co/uOf3l3oAs0

Every effort must be made to protect water supplies in the face of environmental degradation & an increasing global population.

World leaders at #COP26 warn the climate crisis is exacerbating water scarcity & water-related disasters. https://t.co/u1c4zUAavL

Globally, 160 million boys & girls are forced to work -- the majority in crop production, livestock, forestry, fisheries & aquaculture.

@FAO & @ILO say the world must address this serious human rights issue & redouble efforts to #EndChildLabour by 2050. https://t.co/d9AKWLAbeX

At the UN climate summit #COP26, leaders have pledged to take critical steps to save and restore forests.

Efforts will focus on #ClimateAction to preserve biodiversity, achieve #ZeroHunger, protect the rights of indigenous peoples & more. https://t.co/CzF9Q6Ox3a

Free and democratic societies depend on journalists being able to do their jobs.

Every threat made against a journalist is a threat to freedom. 

Tuesday is the International Day to #EndImpunity for Crimes Against Journalists. https://t.co/CUaILFnLfh via @UNESCO https://t.co/n9610lzxlt

"The world is looking to you."

-- #COP26 People's Advocate Sir David Attenborough tells country representatives that although he has witnessed a terrible decline of the planet in his lifetime, they could - and should - witness a wonderful recovery. https://t.co/qKptqOMxfO

"The #COVID19 pandemic & the shadow pandemic of misinformation, has demonstrated that access to facts & science is literally a matter of life & death." 

-- @antonioguterres on Tuesday's International Day to #EndImpunity for Crimes against Journalists. https://t.co/o4DO8sUlLo https://t.co/DWczW3sFxC

Millions of people are displaced and in urgent need of life-saving aid in Ethiopia.

As the humanitarian situation continues to unfold in the country, the UN continues to provide assistance to those in need. https://t.co/gIy5F1uOkP

In the last 15 years, 1,200+ journalists have been killed around the world, with nearly 9 out of 10 cases remaining unresolved.

Tuesday's #EndImpunity Day is an opportunity to redouble efforts to #ProtectJournalists. https://t.co/CUaILFFm6P https://t.co/RMq0qR6O7R

Human traffickers are taking advantage of online technologies to exploit people, including children.

New @UNODC report explores how victims are being targeted & recruited by traffickers via social media & other online platforms. https://t.co/C19W5QOyYf

"It’s time to say: enough. 
Enough of brutalizing biodiversity.
Enough of killing ourselves with carbon.
Enough of treating nature like a toilet.
Enough of burning and drilling and mining our way deeper."

-- @antonioguterres at #COP26. #ClimateAction https://t.co/phZ2PIpMHF

Women journalists are disproportionately targeted with violence online. 

Every threat against a journalist is a threat against freedom. 

More from @UNESCO on Tuesday's Int Day to #EndImpunity for Crimes against Journalists. https://t.co/CUaILFnLfh https://t.co/sMVSsmYFnI

Actor and environmentalist @Maisie_Williams joined us for a #ClimateAction conversation with youth activists at #COP26 in Glasgow on Monday.

See how you can join Maisie and #ActNow to help protect our planet: https://t.co/TrmoKhXA2Y https://t.co/rw6xOiENjI

“The best way to honor those 5 million people lost – and support health workers fighting this virus every day – is to make vaccine equity a reality."

-- @antonioguterres as the number of worldwide deaths due to #COVID19 surpasses 5 million. https://t.co/HhThifSwHL
